title: China Metals in Grip of Frenzy as Investors Bet on Global Rally
description: China’s metal markets are in the grip of a speculative frenzy, with traders and deep-pocketed funds betting on global supply tightness and industrial demand to extend a rally in commodities like copper, nickel and lithium.
